tool.name: upgradeTool

param.name: Source_Metadata
param.dialogReference: This should be the full path to a standalone XML metadata document or a dataset with an existing metadata document.

param.name: Output_Metadata
param.dialogReference: This should be the full path to the standalone XML metadata document that will be produced using this tool. Please review and verify the output before importing it to a dataset or harvesting to a metadata catalog.

tool.summary: This tool creates a copy of the existing FGDC CSDGM metadata, performs the standard upgrade to ArcGIS Metadata, then adds several extra cleanup steps including copying legacy UUIDs to the ISO-Compliant element and cleaning up all legacy elements.
tool.usage: This tool is not recommended for records that have already been upgraded to ArcGIS Metadata.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool creates a copy of the existing FGDC CSDGM metadata, performs the standard upgrade to ArcGIS Metadata, then adds several extra cleanup steps including copying legacy UUIDs to the ISO-Compliant element and cleaning up all legacy elements.
